notesStmt.note: A translation (attributed to Alexander Barclay) from the French original, which is based on Jean Bruyant's poem Le chemin de povretè et de richesse. Cf. BL.
T.p. lacking; title and imprint of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Copy at reel 67 consists of G3,4 only; copy at reel 2292 consists of C1, 2, 5, 6 and D1, 2, 5, 6 only.
Copy at 2292 is a page for page reprint of [1505?] edition which was presented to the Museum by A.H. Huth in 1911. Cf. Huth 29.
